translation.Acompanhei a equipe de manutenção, ajude: I followed the maintenance team, helped with stock organization. I participated in several trainings on maintenance and fire fighting.
translation.Competição de carros FSAE. Tecnologias u: FSAE car competition. Technologies used: Excel, Ansys, SolidWorks and Matlab
translation.Projeto prático de programação em C++ co: Practical C++ programming project with Lego robot.
translation.Olá, Sou desenvolvedor front-end, inicie: Hello, I'm a front-end developer, I started my studies at Alura with a focus on: HTML, CSS and Javascript. I intend to develop myself in React and in the future develop myself for Full Stack careers. I will graduate in Mechanical Engineering, but I intend to focus on the developer profession; use all my experiences gained with internship, extension project and TCC to seek my first experiences as a Front-end. Throughout these engineering experiences, I was able to improve: a positive attitude; manage pressure; organization and resilience.
